text: Juda vahe'mo'za tusi zavi krafa nehazage'za, ranra kumapima kuma kafama erigi'zama mani'naza vahera zaferina zamia omane amane nehie. Maka vahe'mo'za mopafi masene'za zavira nete'za zamasunkura nehaze. Ana nehazageno Jerusalemi kumapinti'ma tusi zavi krafama nehaza zamofo agasasamo'a amenagame mareri'ne.
